Name: The Golem
About the game: You are a small golem. You face daunting puzzles. No fast reactions are required and there is no timer. There is no exploration needed, nor secrets to discover. Not everyone will overcome all the puzzles, and that's OK. No matter how great or small your accomplishments, to take time to think about a difficult problem is a beautiful thing.

Meta Description: Looking for information on The Golem? Check out the release date (Sep 10, 2020), developer insights from Dom Camus, and a complete game summary.
